alert.note: Alert for Jefferson; Madison; Taylor (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 08 at 5:47AM EDT until further notice by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Tallahassee FL has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Florida... Aucilla River at Lamont (US 27) affecting Madison, Jefferson and Taylor Counties. For the Aucilla River...including Lamont (US 27)...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Aucilla River at Lamont (US 27). * WHEN...From late tonight until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 53.0 feet, Minor lowland flooding begins. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 5:30 AM EDT Friday the stage was 52.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage just after midnight tonight and continue rising to a crest of 53.4 feet early Sunday afternoon. - Flood stage is 53.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 53.4 feet on 03/11/1988. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued later this morning.
